content: way repeat row 1-41 and round 42 don t cut the yarn assembly joining first and second parts round 1a with wrong side facing each other chain 1 start near the corner work with slip_stitch around 3 sides of the case through both thickness under back loop of round 42 of up piece and under front loop of round 42 of bottom piece don t cut the yarn 4 all rights reserved pattern photos sunglasses case - author asya instagram/fb pinterest reddit @madebyasya more photos are here https //www instagram com/explore/tags/mba_sunglassescase/ more patterns in my etsy shop https //madebyasya etsy com and on ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/madebyasya stitch types pictures - opensource edge of top round 1e chains 4 first 3 chains counts as 1 double_crochet skip 1 stitch 1 double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch around the top of case till the end of the round finish with slip_stitch in 3rd chain at the beginning of the round round 2e chain 1 1 single_crochet into the same stitch where was last slip_stitch 1 single_crochet around chain-1 space 1 single_crochet in double_crochet of the round below 1 single_crochet around chain-1 space around the round e1 till its ending finish with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet at the beginning of the round cut and fasten the yarn stripe with 3 0 mm hook 75 chains row 1s 74 slip_stitch 1st slip_stitch in 2nd chain counted from the hook cut the yarn make a yarn tail about 10 cm 4 inch insert the stripe through the round 1e make a safe knot cut the yarn 5 all rights reserved pattern photos sunglasses case -
